text: aur aadamee (kee haalat to ye hai ki) jab usako koee takaleeph pahunchatee hai to usee kee taraph roojoo karake apane paravaradigaar se dua karata hai (magar) phir jab khuda apanee taraph se use neamat ata farama deta hai to jis kaam ke lie pahale usase dua karata tha use bhula deta hai aur balki khuda ka shareek banaane lagata hai taaki (us zarie se aur logon ko bhee) usakee raah se gumaraah kar de (ai rasool aise shakhs se) kah do ki thode dinon aur apane kuphr (kee haalat) mein chain kar lo
